header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Apr 3, 2025
parent_header: ## 15 The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

content: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World Kenichi, a solitary man in his 40s, finds himself inexplicably transported to a fantastical realm.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Apr 3, 2025
parent_header: ## 15 The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

content:
As he navigates through a perilous forest filled with monsters, he discovers an extraordinary ability: access to a vast online marketplace.
Harnessing this newfound power, Kenichi begins to trade items he collects in this strange world for cash.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Apr 3, 2025
parent_header: ## 15 The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

content:
With the funds he generates, he purchases modern goods from the internet, quickly establishing a thriving business.
However, rather than expanding his enterprise further, Kenichi yearns for a tranquil and leisurely lifestyle.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Apr 3, 2025
parent_header: ## 15 The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

content:
He chooses to settle down and enjoy the fruits of his labor, living comfortably off the resources available to him.
Thus begins the unique mail-order journey of a middle-aged man in an alternate universe!
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Apr 3, 2025
parent_header: ## 15 The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World

parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content: Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World is about a 30-year-old man named Theon, who had long dreamed of wielding magic, met an untimely death.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content:
Upon awakening, he found himself reborn in a new world, filled with hope that magic would be a part of this reality.
However, to his dismay, he discovered that magic did not exist in this realm.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content:
Overwhelmed by disappointment and lethargy, Theon spiraled into a state of despair.
Yet, a pivotal event sparked his curiosity and led him to uncover the existence of magic after all.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content:
"Indeed, if magic is absent, I shall create it myself," he resolved.
From that moment on, Theon dedicated himself to the study of magic.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content:
His journey took a dramatic turn when a devastating disease emerged, one that could only be cured through magical means.
Additionally, he faced formidable foes that could only be vanquished by magic.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content: Through these trials, Theon transformed into a hero, ultimately saving the world.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

content: This tale chronicles the journey of an ordinary man driven by fate, who harnesses the power of magic and an unyielding spirit to overcome challenges and spread the knowledge of magic to others.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 9 to Mar 27, 2025
parent_header: ## 14 Magic Maker: How to Create Magic in Another World

parent_header: ## 12 Teogonia

content: Teogonia in the unforgiving landscape known as the borderlands, humanity is locked in a relentless struggle against demi-human creatures that threaten their existence and seek to claim their land and deities.
header: ###### Start & End Date: April 2025 to Spring 2025
parent_header: ## 12 Teogonia

content: A young boy named Kai stands bravely to defend his village but suffers a grave injury that triggers the awakening of memories from a previous life.
header: ###### Start & End Date: April 2025 to Spring 2025
parent_header: ## 12 Teogonia

content: For those who lack a guardian deity, life feels like an unyielding challenge, akin to playing a game on the hardest difficulty setting.
header: ###### Start & End Date: April 2025 to Spring 2025
parent_header: ## 12 Teogonia

content: With his newfound awareness of the harsh "rules" governing his world, Kai realizes the stark inequalities faced by those without divine protection.
header: ###### Start & End Date: April 2025 to Spring 2025
parent_header: ## 12 Teogonia

content: Thus begins the extraordinary journey of a young boy as he rises through a vast realm filled with magic, violence, and intrigue, determined to carve out a path for himself amidst the chaos.
header: ###### Start & End Date: April 2025 to Spring 2025

parent_header: ## 11 The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess

content: The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, a 52-year-old civil servant in modern Japan, unexpectedly finds himself reborn as Grace Auvergne, the notorious villainess from an otome game his daughter used to enjoy.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 10 to Mar 28, 2025
parent_header: ## 11 The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess

content: Confused by this sudden change, Kenzaburou realizes he is meant to embody the role of a haughty noblewoman, but his disciplined demeanor makes it difficult for him to act with the expected arrogance.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 10 to Mar 28, 2025
parent_header: ## 11 The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess

content: Instead, his calm and kind nature leads him to forge friendships with the heroine and earn the admiration of his peers, becoming a symbol of grace.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 10 to Mar 28, 2025
parent_header: ## 11 The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess

content: As he navigates this new world while trying to keep the story on course, Kenzaburou must rely on his extensive life experience, impeccable manners, and strong family values to connect with those around him.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 10 to Mar 28, 2025
parent_header: ## 11 The Middle-Aged Man That Reincarnated as a Villainess

content: This journey challenges him to adapt to his new identity while maintaining his core principles.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 10 to Mar 28, 2025

content: Lord of the Mysteries , the question looms: who can truly be considered a Beyonder?

parent_header: ## 10 Lord of the Mysteries

content: Amidst the shadows of history and the whispers of lurking evils, Zhou Mingrui awakens to find himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Summer 2025 to ??? 2025
parent_header: ## 10 Lord of the Mysteries

content: This new reality is rich with mechanical wonders, from cannons and dreadnoughts to airships and intricate difference machines, alongside mystical elements such as potions, divination, hexes, tarot cards, and sealed artifacts.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Summer 2025 to ??? 2025
parent_header: ## 10 Lord of the Mysteries

content:
As light persists, mysteries abound.
Klein's journey leads him into the complex web of various churches both orthodox and unorthodox as he gradually uncovers his latent powers through the consumption of Beyonder potions.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Summer 2025 to ??? 2025
parent_header: ## 10 Lord of the Mysteries

content: Embodying the essence of "The Fool," represented by the tarot card numbered 0, which symbolizes limitless potential, Klein's tale unfolds as he navigates this enigmatic world filled with danger and intrigue.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Summer 2025 to ??? 2025

content: Join him as he confronts the challenges that lie ahead in a narrative woven with magic and adventure.

content: The Sage must unite 21 distinct wizards to combat a catastrophic event known as the Great Calamity, which occurs annually when the moon descends, wreaking havoc with its magical powers.
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 6 to Mar 24, 2025
parent_header: ## 09 Promise of Wizard

content:
Each wizard possesses unique backgrounds and philosophies, leading to initial distrust among them.
However, as they face challenges together, they begin to rely on the Sage and each other.

content: Summoned to a daunting fantasy realm by the Demon Overlord, he is offered a peculiar new role as one of the Heavenly Kings in the Overlord's army, complete with enticing benefits!
header: ###### Start & End Date: Jan 1 to Mar 17, 2025
parent_header: ## 08 Headhunted to Another World: From Salaryman to Big Four!

content:

The question remains: will his unique talents be sufficient to ensure his survival in this perilous new world?

content:

Wishing for a tranquil life free from conflict, he opts for what seems like a mundane creation skill.

This unexpected cheat skill transforms Takumi into a prosperous merchant and makes him virtually invincible in combat.

parent_header: ## 06 Hell Mode: Gamer Who Likes to Speedrun Becomes Peerless in a Parallel World with Obsolete Setting
